title: Under Pressure
lyrics:
[intro] (D) (A) (G) (A) x2
 
(D)Pressure… pushing (A)down on me
Pressing (G)down on you, no man ask (A)for
Under (D)pressure… that burns a (A)building down
Splits a (G)family in two, puts (A)people on streets
(D) Um ba ba bay, (A) um ba ba bay
(G) Dee day duh, (A) ee day duh
 
[bridge]
It's the (G)terror of knowing, what this (A)world is about
(G) Watching some good friends, screaming (A) let me out!
Pray to-(G)morrow, takes me (A) higher
[single strum] Pressure (D)on people… people (G)on (A)streets
 
[interlude] (D)Day day dep (A) Da da da bap ba (G) Okay! (A)
 
(D) Chippin' around, (A) I kick my brains round the floor
(G) These are the days, it (A)never rains but it pours
(D) Ee do bay bup, (A) ee do bay ba bup
(G) Ee do bup, (A)bay bup
(D)People on streets… Dee da (A)dee da day
(G)People on streets… Dee da (A)dee da dee da dee da
 
[bridge]
It's the (G)terror of knowing, what this (A)world is about
(G) Watching some good friends, screaming (A) let me out!
Pray to-(G)morrow, takes me (A)high high higher
Pressure (D)on people… people (G)on (A)streets
 
[bridge 2]
(G) Turned a-(G)way from it all, like the (C)blind man
(G) Sat on a fence but it (C)don't work
Keep (G)coming up with love
But it's so (A)slashed and torn
Whyyy-(C)y? Why-(F)ay? (G) (F) (F)
(A)Love Love Love Love! (A)
In(A)sanity laughs under pressure we're cracking
 
Can't we (D)give ourselves one more (A)chance?
Why can't we (D)give love, that one more (A)chance?
Why can't we (D)give love, (A)give love, (D)give love, (A)give love? 
 
Cause (G)love's such an (A)old fashioned (D)word
And love (A)dares you to (G)care
For the (A)people on the (D)edge of the (A)night
And love (G)dares you to (A)change our way
Of (D)caring a(A)bout ourselves
(G)This is our (A)last dance
(G)This is our (A)last chance
(D)This is our(G)selves (A)
 
Under (D)pressure (A)... under (G)pressure (A)
Under (D)pressure (A)... (G)Pressure (G-A) [end]
